speaker: President.
english: President. I am much obliged to you both, Mr Barón Crespo and Mr Brok. It is good to see your youthful enthusiasm when it comes to our common future.
original: President. I am much obliged to you both, Mr Barón Crespo and Mr Brok. It is good to see your youthful enthusiasm when it comes to our common future.
agenda_item: Roadmap for the European Union's constitutional process (debate)
